Name: Grave
Desc:
Embeds a Death Mark on the enemy with a cursed sword to weaken the enemy and target with Ether Swords, Shards, and Marker.
Using this skill again when there already is an enemy with the Death Mark, or embedding another enemy with Death Mark when skill is on cooldown, removes the mark.
Grave prioritizes attacking the enemy with highest Max HP within range and isn't affected by Cooldown Reset effects.
Required Skill: Order Lv. 20 or above
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 5th Job Skill, Infinite

H.Old:
MP Cost: 150. Attacks up to 1 enemies at 220% DAMAGE 10 times.
Additional IGNORE DEF +10% against enemies with the Death Mark.
If there is a marked enemy within range of ordered Ether Swords and Ether Swords, Shards, or Marker created from Infinite, attacks are focused upon that enemy.
Cooldown: 10 sec.
